headline: Ingersoll Rand Earnings Shift Toward Life Science And Recurring Revenue
summary: Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) reported strong quarterly results alongside the completion of 16 acquisitions in 2025. At the start of 2026, the company acquired Scinomix, also referred to as Synomics, adding to its Life Science portfolio. These moves expand Ingersoll Rand's presence in higher value, recurring revenue and specialized markets. For investors watching NYSE:IR, the story now goes beyond headline earnings to how the business is being reshaped. With a current share price of $98.52 and a...
